privacyConsent.title: Privacy Policy
privacyConsent.agreeCheckbox: I agree to the Privacy Policy

privacyPolicy.fullText:
PRIVACY POLICY — SenWords

Last updated: 17/02/2026

1. DATA COLLECTION

We collect the following information when you use SenWords:

• Account information: Display name, email (via SSO login with Google, Facebook, or Apple)
• Date of birth: For age verification (must be 13 years or older)
• Learning data: Vocabulary learning progress, scores, learning goals
• Device information: Device type, OS version (for performance optimization)

Important: We do NOT collect any personal data before you verify your age and agree to this policy.

2. DATA STORAGE

• Data is securely stored on the Supabase platform with AES-256 encryption
• Authentication tokens are encrypted with AES-256-GCM on your device
• We do not store passwords — authentication is via SSO providers

3. DATA SHARING

We do NOT sell or share your personal data with third parties, except:

• SSO providers (Google, Facebook, Apple): Only for login authentication
• Error analytics service (Sentry): Only anonymous technical data to improve the app
• Legal requirements: When required by authorized authorities

4. YOUR RIGHTS

You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

• Right to access: View all data we store about you
• Right to delete: Request deletion of all personal data
• Right to export: Download your data in a common format
• Right to withdraw: Withdraw consent at any time

5. AGE POLICY

• SenWords is for users aged 13 and above
• Users under 13 cannot create accounts or use the app
• If an under-13 user is detected, the account will be immediately disabled

6. CONTACT INFORMATION

If you have questions about the privacy policy, please contact:
• Email: privacy@senwords.app
• Address: [Company address]

7. POLICY CHANGES

We may update this policy. When significant changes are made, you will be notified via the app.
